display_long_description:
Welcome to the ultimate marble fantasy world of Marblecraft! Explore and try out every possibility related to marbles!

- In the mixed reality environment, build your own marble heaven in your living room or backyard! There are over a hundred diverse building modules, tracks, obstacles, themed decorations and preset systems! With easy-to-learn but powerful editor, you'll have a joyful building experience.
[media]

- Solve 60+ unique puzzles as you level up your building skills! From forests to deserts, medieval villages to space hubs, tackle mind-bending challenges by building and routing with limited modules!
[media]

- Build marble F1 tracks and watch them race! Create marble music with a piano and watch them dance the waltz! You can even craft your own pinball machine and play it right in your living room—imagination is your only limit! Share your top-tier creations and explore a global library of creative builds!
[media]

Join us to create marble masterpiece together!
